wikipedia_page.main: Major-General William Henry Snyder Nickerson,  (27 March 1875, Dorchester, New Brunswick – 1954), was a Canadian recipient of the Victoria Cross, the highest and most prestigious award for gallantry in the face of the enemy that can be awarded to British and Commonwealth forces.

response: * William Henry Snyder Nickerson - Dorchester born winner of the Victoria Cross for actions performed during the Second Boer War.
*William Henry Snyder Nickerson (1875–1954), Canadian Major-General and recipient of the Victoria Cross
*William Henry Snyder Nickerson, VC (1875–1954), physician and soldier
